subject: Welcome to Qui Browser, {{user.firstName}}!
html:
Welcome to Qui Browser!

Hi {{user.firstName}},

Thank you for joining Qui Browser! We're excited to have you as part of our community.

Here's what you can do to get started:

  • Explore your personalized dashboard
  • Create your first bookmark collection
  • Customize your browser settings
  • Discover new features

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to our support team.

Get Started

Best regards,
The Qui Browser Team

If you didn't create this account, please ignore this email.

Contact Support
